textBox.richText: Zarra Studios has updated its seSales point of sale software for Mac OS X. This update includes the following enhancements: iPhoto integration -- It is now possible to link one or more images in your iPhoto library with the products in your inventory. Custom Values -- You can now create custom fields for your inventory items to make it easier to identify each unique item. You can now specify additional information about an item such as its color or size. Input Values -- You can now create input values that will query the cashier at the time of sale. This allows you to track unique values such as serial numbers directly from Simply Elegant Sales. Universal Application -- Simply Elegant Sales is now officially a universal application and can run on both PPC Macintosh computers as well as Intel Macintosh computers. This is a free upgrade to all existing customers.
